revision.text: Possibly: The physicians' portable library: or compendium of the modern practice of physic. In which the causes, symptoms and treatment of all the diseases incident to the human body are clearly and fully delivered; together with the virtues, doses and proper exhibition of all medicinal simples and compoosition directed in the laft London & Edinburgh Pharmacopoeias to which are added, tables of the new names adopted by each college, and of their reference to those formerly in use. (By Brabazon Smith). (London : Printed for J. Mathews, No.18, strand; by W. Smith, King Street, seven dials., MDCCC [1800]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2505519~S1
